name: reldmnghm

stmt.origin: reldmmpt2(hs0, hs1, cnghm, cngp, cngp, cima(ccnv(co(cv(hs0), cnmo, cv(hs1))), cr))
stmt.pretty: reldmmpt2(hs0, hs1, cnghm, cngp, cngp, (`'(hs0[normOp]hs1)" ℝ))

body.origin:
|- wrel(cdm(cnghm))
-| wceq(cnghm, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cngp, cngp, cima(ccnv(co(cv(hs0), cnmo, cv(hs1))), cr)))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffsc(hs1, cngp)
body.pretty:
⊢ Rel(dom(NGHom))
⊣ NGHom =(hs0 ∈ NrmGrp, hs1 ∈ NrmGrp ↦(`'(hs0[normOp]hs1)" ℝ))
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)
⊣ d(hs1, NrmGrp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wrel(cdm(cnghm))
-| wceq(cnghm, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cngp, cngp, cima(ccnv(co(cv(hs0), cnmo, cv(hs1))), cr)))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
-| diffsc(hs1, cngp)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Rel(dom(NGHom))
⊣ NGHom =(hs0 ∈ NrmGrp, hs1 ∈ NrmGrp ↦(`'(hs0[normOp]hs1)" ℝ))
⊣ d(hs0, hs1)
⊣ d(hs1, NrmGrp)

body.origin:
|- wceq(cnghm, cmpo(hs0, hs1, cngp, cngp, cima(ccnv(co(cv(hs0), cnmo, cv(hs1))), cr)))
-| diffss(hs0, hs1)
body.pretty:

⊣ d(hs0, hs1)

comment: Lemma for normed group homomorphisms. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Oct-2015.)
